body: In the Melee phase, the army deals +1d4 points of damage against an undead target army. Instead of dealing extra damage to an enemy army, the army can use this ability to heal itself; if it takes an OM penalty equal to half its ACR for one Ranged or Melee phase, it heals a number of hit points equal to its ACR.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Mass Combat/Special Abilities/Channel Positive Energy (Cleric 1/Paladin 4)
name: Channel Positive Energy (Cleric 1, Paladin 4)
